snippet: A South Korean conscript soldier shot and killed five of his fellow unit members and injured five others late on Saturday at a guard post near the heavily armed border with North Korea, a South Korean official said....

headline.print_headline: South Korea Soldier Shoots Dead Five Comrades Near Border With North
headline.main: South Korea Soldier Shoots Dead Five Comrades Near Border With North

lead_paragraph: A South Korean conscript soldier shot and killed five of his fellow unit members and injured five others late on Saturday at a guard post near the heavily armed border with North Korea, a South Korean official said.
